desc: This is the home page for Sacred Serendib. The home page contains information of products that Sacred Serendib sell. This includes Ceylon cinnamon sticks, Ceylon cinnamon powder and Ceylon cinnamon essential leaf oil 10ml.

layout.text: Our Ceylon cinnamon products are grown and cared for by farmers that cherish Ceylon cinnamon as much as we do. We only work with the best to ensure you only consume the best.
